response.original_title: The Adventures of a Nurse (Parts I and II)
response.overview: Part I: The artist, in the role of a nurse, fantasizes on romantic themes, using a set of foot-high, hand-painted paper dolls as actors. A fantasy within a fantasy. The "Nurse Eleanor" paper doll performs as a surrogate self for Nurse Eleanor Antin and is the much put-upon but brave heroine of a succession of romances with a dying poet, a biker, and a doctor.  Part II: "Nurse Eleanor's" romantic odyssey continues with two new lovers â€” a French ski bum and an anti-war senator.
response.title: The Adventures of a Nurse (Parts I and II)
